ComicInfo.Summary:
Exiled! As a result of the politics of war Rai is forced to leave Japan with his son. Adrift in space, can Rai make it to Earth?
Exiled from Japan, Rai and his infant son fly to Earth on a shuttle. But a Healer leader has rigged the craft to fly out of control into space! He then assassinates the President and has Kazuyo captured, her ring-hand severed so she cannot summon her armor! Meanwhile, Rai uses the energy in his body to power his shuttle-craft down to Earth. Rising from the wreck with his son, Rai finds Rokkie and Gilad waiting to take him to Unity!
